price: 31. o kai jie grįždavo pas savo žmones, jie grįždavo juokaudami,
arabic: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُواْ فَكِهِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā inqalabū ilā ahlihimu inqalabū fakihīna
